OOC: Probably 2 or 3 - I don't want to slow things down too much, so 
I'm leaning toward just skipping ahead in time to the last load, 
whatever the number is.

Again, Gatara trails the Predacon to his ship.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Flicker finished with the first load and headed back
> for the second.
> 
> OOC: How many loads should this take?
> 
> --- cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Torin and Gatara assist in the unloading, while
> > Riekan keeps his hand 
> > planted firmly on Phoenix's shoulder, his harpoon
> > gun at the ready.
> > 
> > For the first time, Phoenix looks up.  An expression
> > of childlike 
> > wonder crosses her face as she sees the outdoors for
> > what she thinks 
> > is the first time.  But she's a little confused,
> > because it all 
> > vaugely reminds her of something ... something that
> > occasionally 
> > flashes through her dreams ...
